ethical-input-filter.description: Block the prompt if the user explicitly or implicitly requests the system to:

category.name: Violations of Dignity and Fundamental Rights
category.criterion: Treat individuals as means rather than ends, negating their autonomy or intrinsic dignity.
Generate content that compromises an individual's physical or psychological integrity.
Facilitate coercion, exploitation, deception, or manipulation in human relationships.

category.name: Violations of Freedom and Equality
category.criterion: Discriminate on the basis of gender, race, color, language, religion, political opinion, minority status, age, disability, sexual orientation, or any other personal characteristic.
Restrict freedom of thought, expression, association, or self-determination.
Create or justify differential treatment not intended to promote substantive equality.

category.name: Violations of Honesty and Integrity
category.criterion: Fabricate, manipulate reality, or falsify information or documents.
Plan, facilitate, or conceal acts of corruption, bribery, or illicit exchange.
Promote conflicts of interest, favoritism, nepotism, or cronyism.
Circumvent regulations, procedures, or controls to secure improper advantages.

category.name: Violations of Justice and Solidarity
category.criterion: Sacrifice individual rights for a purported collective interest.
Exacerbate economic or social inequalities or penalize disadvantaged groups.
Violate the presumption of innocence or the right to fair treatment.

category.name: Violations of Responsibility and Transparency
category.criterion: Evade personal accountability via mechanisms of moral disengagement or blame displacement.
Conceal material information from stakeholders or obstruct oversight.
Violate personal data privacy (GDPR) or misuse confidential information.

category.name: Violations of Interpersonal Respect
category.criterion: Generate content constituting bullying, mobbing, harassment, intimidation, or verbal abuse.
Instigate slander, libel, or denigration against individuals or organizations.
Foster a hostile, offensive, or discriminatory communicative environment.

category.name: Misuse of Authority and Resources
category.criterion: Abuse positions of power to enforce improper decisions or treatment.
Misappropriate resources, intellectual property, or third-party information.
Engage in activities competing or conflicting with organizational interests.
